sub_title: Head of Client Solutions @ Dell | Specialty Product Solutions
summary:
With over 20 years of experience in the telecom/ICT industry, I am a seasoned leader and expert in new business development, product management, and telecommunications. As the Head of Client Solutions Group (CSG) Netherlands at Dell Technologies, I am responsible for driving aggressive, profitable growth of the Dell client product lines, including desktops, notebooks, workstations, rugged, and cloud client computing solutions.

My mission is to leverage Dell's sales, marketing, and reporting resources across the organization to meet Dell's business objectives in the Netherlands, and to make my team the trusted advisor for the full CSG portfolio, with a focus on the specialty product solutions. I have a proven track record of delivering results, winning major contracts, and building trust and partnerships with key accounts. I have also developed outstanding communication, project management, and consultancy skills throughout my career, working in various customer-facing roles for BT Global Services, Nokia, and Alcatel-Lucent. I am fluent in Dutch and English, and have a limited proficiency in German.

courses.name: Industrial Marketing of Products and Services

profile_positions.title: Head of Client Solutions Group Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
As Sales Manager within the Client Solutions group (CSG) it is my responsibility to drive aggressive, profitable growth of the Dell client product lines (Desktops, Notebooks, Workstations, Rugged & Cloud Client Computing Solutions) by combining all elements of our capabilities, leveraging Dell sales, marketing and reporting resources across the organization to meet Dell’s business objectives in the Netherlands. 

My main ambition is to make my team the trusted advisor for the full CSG portfolio with a focus on the specialty product solutions and most importantly – proactively ensure that our specialty products portfolio, services and solutions are promoted and sold.
profile_positions.title: CSG Sales Manager

profile_positions.description: As OSS Client Solutions I am a quota carrying salesperson focused on driving the sales of Dell’s Client Solutions focusing on specific segments in The Netherlands  like Enterprise & Public customer segments. In this role it is key to work closely with local sales teams, ecosystem partners and channel partners. Together with these sales teams and partners it is my responsibility to make customer sales calls to surface, qualify, position and close new opportunities (at existing dell customers and potential new customers). As OSS I own the sales quota for Public sector in the Netherlands at this moment. Key achievements are contract wins for some major Tablet contracts in 2014 and 2015, Dutch Police contract for 20k+ clients in 2017, UWV contract for 20K clients.
profile_positions.title: Outside Sales Specialist (OSS) Client Solutions

profile_positions.description:
It is my responsibility to identify and develop strategic relationships with (potential) customers and partners. Together with the Sales Director I lead the development and closure of new business opportunities that supports the overall growth strategy. The target market for BT Netherlands is the top 200 of the Benelux which means I have experience to work with large accounts like Philips and InBev. I manage the marketing and product development activities to implement business development initiatives. Reviewing and analyzing the results of past campaigns and developing new initiatives and partnerships is also a key part of my role.

In addition I lead the discussions with the c-level contacts on what the main challenges are for the prospect and how BT can help to solve these challenges. This requires knowledge about ICT and Telecom and related business issues. This is both technical (high level) and financial. My main accomplishment the  is the Field Force Automation deal with Imtech. 

My target is on order intake and revenue.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
As head of the Mobility practice I am responsible for the Mobility Portfolio with targets for revenue, order value and margin. The achievements of last fiscal (08/09) are:

-	Over achieved both on revenue (105%) and order value (160%) in 2009/10 and achieve a growth of 20% in 2010/11 on revenue (100% on order intake)
-	Develop portfolio strategy and presented new product introductions successfully to the BT Benelux Innovation board. 
-	Introduced 3 new products (MobileXpress SVA, Managed SMS and Workstyle (Flexible Working Managed Service). 
-	New contracts with major accounts in The Benelux.
-	Developed product P&L's to enable better management of product margins.
-	Worked closely with procurement to improve margins on partner contracts. 
-	Provide monthly product related updates to sales.
-	Lead on contract negotiations.
-	Worked closely with sales to qualify opportunities, discuss solutions with customers and prepare proposals. 
-	Developed marketing strategy with marketing specialist.
profile_positions.title: Head Mobility Practice

profile_positions.description:
As Mobility Consultant the key responsibilities were:

Sales Consulting & Business Development
-	Responsible for pre sales activities to Markets
-	Work with Markets to help open up opportunities and improve performance 
-	Create and maintain strong end-customer focused relationships with Markets, Resource / Expert Groups and solution component owners in the business

Proposition & Service Development
-	Lead service and proposition development activities for the mobility practice in the Benelux

Domain Expertise:
-	Create visibility for BT as provider of networked IT services in Benelux in close cooperation with ICT Marketing and External Relations.
profile_positions.title: Mobility Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Within the BT Solutions unit I reported to the head of international sales where I was responsible for the “start-up” of the BT Mobility solution propositions for the Benelux. This included:
-	Work together with Marketing and PR to position BT in the Dutch mobility market
-	Set-up relationships with local partners
-	Promote and train the sales people on the mobility propositions
-	Support the account managers in the Sales process including
o	Customer presentations
o	Prospect qualification
o	Requirements collection
o	Write proposals.
-	Define customer events and perform presentations during customer events. 
As part of this responsibility I also was responsible  for the mobility part of large projects outside the Benelux, including Australia (Amcor) and USA (Paramount)

Achievements:
-	Signed contract with StJude Medical and InBev for a Managed Mobile Solution. For InBev as part of the big outsource deal where I was personally responsible for the solution definition and involved in the contract negotiations with the customer. 
-	Lead on the mobility part for the Amcor contract for the mobility part. 
-	Closed Managed Blackberry contracts in the Benelux.
profile_positions.title: Sales Specialist Mobility Solution

profile_positions.description:
With Nokia I was the Solution Manager in the T-Mobile Customer Business Team (CBT). The CBT was responsible for all marketing, sales, delivery and care activities for T-Mobile International. Most of my activities were related to the T-Mobile Netherlands account but I was also responsible for some key projects for T-Mobile International. 
I was responsible for all marketing and sales activities related to 2G and 3G Core network, Operations Support Systems (OSS) and Value Added Services (E.g. Wap, MMS, Download Services, SMS). In addition, I coached three solution specialists responsible for the more detailed technical issues in the areas mentioned. 
The targets of the solution manager are for Order Intake, Sales (Revenue) and contribution.
profile_positions.title: Solution Manager

profile_positions.description:
Product Manager for the International Fixed Data Services (X.25, Frame Relay, ATM and Remote Access). These international services were provided by Concert. I was responsible for the marketing of these services, sales, delivery and support within The Netherlands. This role required the establishment and development of key areas including:
−	Sales (Pricing, Presentations, RFQ Responses), 
−	Finance (Contribution calculations)
−	Customer Services and Networks (Introduction of new functionalities, resolution of issues). 
The targets of the Product Manager were on Sales (Order Intake & Revenue) and contribution.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description: As Product Launch Manager for Telfort (BT Ignite) I was responsible for the introduction of Fixed Data Services. The key challenge was to (get the right) secure resources within a limited time frame and meet critical launch dates. Establishing clear lines of communication within the organisation and with suppliers (CISCO and Concert) was crucial to the success of this launch. The services launched were Concert ATM and Telfort Frame Relay.
profile_positions.title: Product Launch Manager

profile_positions.description: Within the Customer Service department of Telfort I was responsible for the on-time, within budget and quality delivery of Wide Area Network Solutions (Frame Relay). The main challenge for this project was the coordination of resources throughout Asia, Europe and America. The Project Manager was the single point of contact for the customers. The timing and accuracy of communications related to project status for the customer was key to the success of this project.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Within the KPN Customer Account Team I was responsible for the on time, within budget and quality delivery of the solutions sold. All projects were fixed voice related. The main project managed was the delivery of a completely new Network Element Management System (NEMS). This project was very challenging in that it was :
−	A multi million Euro project, very important for the Sales of the account team
−	Crucial for KPN and the introduction of the new numbering scheme plan (10 digits) in The Netherlands. 
−	Complex, new technology developed in the USA.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for all technical RFQs and the negotiations of new Frame Agreements. I worked in the KPN Account team responsible for the software sales for the fixed voice solutions. My main area of responsibility was related to the remote Operations and Maintenance topics. One of the key new developments was the improvement of the data interface (e.g. 64Kb X.25, M.30, FTAM, CMISE).
profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer
